name: Needy Nyan Softlock
author: My Smart Side 002
description: Needy: While this needy is inactive, it shows a still image of Nyan Cat. When this needy activates, Nyan Cat will move and its song will play. Whenever a module becomes disarmed while this needy is activated, it will strike. A bomb should not have more than one Needy Nyan Softlock. 10 seconds is the default for the timer.
